title: Apprehended
description: From the New York Times bestselling suspense author Jan Burke comes a brand-new e-short story with the added bonus of three short stories from the Eighteen anthology.Apprehended is a mini-anthology containing a brand new short story from Jan "The Unacknowledged," which features the fan-favorite investigative reporter Irene Kelly, back in her journalism school days. Also included are three short stories from the previously published "Why Tonight," "A Fine Set of Teeth," and "A Man of My Stature."Praise for "Astonishing…wry…these stories are sure to delight." —New York Times bestselling author Jeffrey Deaver"A delightful collection of page-turners. At turns chilling, funny, poignant—and always insightful. With these stories, Jan Burke’s at the top of her game." —New York Times bestselling author Jonathan Kellerman
author: Jan Burke
